article_title: Family of aid worker killed in Gaza call for inquiry
sentence: Israel  launched  its  military  campaign  in  Gaza    in  response  to  Hamas's  unprecedented  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  during  which  about  1,200  were  killed  and  251  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Family of aid worker killed in Gaza call for inquiry
sentence: More  than  40,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
